keyword: how many calories are in an eggo waffle
title: How Many Calories Are in an Eggo Waffle?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in an Eggo waffle, including carbs, protein, fat, full nutrition breakdown, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in an Eggo Waffle?
assumptions: Standard Eggo Original frozen waffle (52 g), toasted without added butter or syrup.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand batch, toasting method, and toppings. Check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One toasted Eggo waffle provides about 90 calories and 2 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in an Eggo waffle?
faqs.a: About 90 calories for one standard toasted Eggo Original waffle.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in an Eggo waffle?
faqs.a: Approximately 17 g carbs, including 1 g fiber and 4 g sugars per waffle.

faqs.q: Is an Eggo waffle high in protein?
faqs.a: No, it has about 2 g protein per waffle; pair with toppings for more.

faqs.q: How does sodium content compare in Eggo waffles?
faqs.a: One waffle has around 170 mg sodium; varies by flavor like blueberry.

faqs.q: Do frozen Eggo waffles change calories when toasted?
faqs.a: Minimal change; toasting doesn't add calories unless oil is used.
